blockquote.para: For a full list of functions for interacting with the V5 Controller, see its : C API and C++ API.
Feedback from the V5 Controller comes in two forms - analog and digital. The analog data comes from the joysticks, and the digital data comes from the buttons.

detaileddescription.para: The analog data is a value in the range of [-127,127], and digital data is either 1 or 0 (pressed or unpressed, respectively).
